title: Extreme weather coupled with high fire risk leaves Xcel Energy with no easy choices (Opinion)
description: While it’s not possible to estimate the exact damage that could have occurred had these lines been energized, the conditions at the time suggest that any ignition had the potential to become a catastrophic fire.
content: As extreme weather intensifies across the globe, wildfires have become a growing and well-documented threat to Colorados communities. Some areas of the state now experience 50 additional fire-weather… [+4215 chars]
de: Extremes Wetter gepaart mit hoher Brandgefahr lässt Xcel Energy keine einfachen Entscheidungen (Meinung). Obwohl es nicht möglich ist, den genauen Schaden abzuschätzen, der hätte entstehen können, wenn diese Leitungen unter Strom stünden, deuten die damaligen Bedingungen darauf hin, dass jede Entzündung zu einem katastrophalen Brand führen könnte.
en: Extreme weather coupled with high fire risk leaves Xcel Energy with no easy choices (Opinion). While it’s not possible to estimate the exact damage that could have occurred had these lines been energized, the conditions at the time suggest that any ignition had the potential to become a catastrophic fire.
la: Extrema tempestas cum magno igne periculo copulata relinquit Xcel Energy cum non facile electiones (Opinio). title: Brandon-based trauma support group for first-responders expands to the north
description: Project Resilience 911, co-founded and led by Amanda Griffith Conway, began in 2020 to connect first responders with peers who understand the cumulative trauma of emergency work, she said. Now, they’re helping create a peer support network based in The Pas.
content: A Brandon-based peer-support group for first-responders is expanding into northern Manitoba, aiming to close critical mental-health gaps for emergency workers facing trauma far from specialized servi… [+4704 chars]
de: Die in Brandon ansässige Trauma-Selbsthilfegruppe für Ersthelfer expandiert nach Norden. Das von Amanda Griffith Conway mitbegründete und geleitete Projekt Resilience 911 begann im Jahr 2020, um Ersthelfer mit Gleichgesinnten zusammenzubringen, die das kumulative Trauma der Notfallarbeit verstehen, sagte sie. Jetzt helfen sie beim Aufbau eines Peer-Support-Netzwerks mit Sitz in The Pas.
en: Brandon-based trauma support group for first-responders expands to the north. Project Resilience 911, co-founded and led by Amanda Griffith Conway, began in 2020 to connect first responders with peers who understand the cumulative trauma of emergency work, she said. Now, they’re helping create a peer support network based in The Pas.
la: Brandon-substructio trauma coetus subsidii primi responds dilatatur ad septentrionem. Resilience Project 911, ab Amanda Griffith Conway co-condita et ductus, anno 2020 primum responders cum paribus coniungere coepit qui cumulativo trauma subitis operis intellegentes dixit. Nunc, adiuvantes parem auxilium creare retiacula quae in The Pas.

title: New Denver artist maps movements of evacuees displaced by 2024 Slocan Valley wildfires
description: Two years ago, New Denver, B.C., artist Petra Hekkenberg was forced to leave her home during the 2024 Slocan Lake Complex wildfires. She's since created a community map with the help of residents, showing where they evacuated during the fires.
content:
Two years ago, New Denver, B.C., artist Petra Hekkenberg was forced to leave her home due after several wildfires prompted evacuation orders and alerts in the Slocan Valley area.
Reflecting on the 2… [+3404 chars]
de: Ein neuer Künstler aus Denver kartiert die Bewegungen der Evakuierten, die durch die Waldbrände im Slocan Valley im Jahr 2024 vertrieben wurden. Vor zwei Jahren musste die Künstlerin Petra Hekkenberg in New Denver, B.C., während der Waldbrände im Slocan Lake Complex im Jahr 2024 ihr Zuhause verlassen. Seitdem hat sie mit Hilfe der Anwohner eine Gemeindekarte erstellt, die zeigt, wo sie während der Brände evakuiert wurden.
en: New Denver artist maps movements of evacuees displaced by 2024 Slocan Valley wildfires. Two years ago, New Denver, B.C., artist Petra Hekkenberg was forced to leave her home during the 2024 Slocan Lake Complex wildfires. She's since created a community map with the help of residents, showing where they evacuated during the fires.
la: Novus Denver artifex mappis motus evacuorum ab 2024 Slocan Vallis incendia efferatus est. Duobus annis ante, New Denver, B.C., artifex Petrae Hekkenberg domum suam relinquere coactus est per 2024 lacus Complexum Slocan incendia. Illa ex quo mappam communitatis ope incolarum creavit, ostendens ubi per ignes excesserint.

title: Team uncovers secret of fungi that eats charcoal
description: New research digs into how fungi that are barely detectable in the soil before a fire are able to proliferate wildly once an area has burned.
content:
New research digs into how fire-loving fungi learned to eat charcoal.
Wildfire causes most living things to flee or die, but some fungi thrive afterward, even feasting on charred remains.
New Unive… [+3683 chars]
de: Das Team lüftet das Geheimnis eines Pilzes, der Holzkohle frisst. Neue Forschungsergebnisse untersuchen, wie sich Pilze, die vor einem Brand kaum im Boden nachweisbar sind, nach einem Brand in einer Fläche wild vermehren können.
en: Team uncovers secret of fungi that eats charcoal. New research digs into how fungi that are barely detectable in the soil before a fire are able to proliferate wildly once an area has burned.
la: Team aperit secretum fungi qui carbonem comedit. Nova investigatio in fodit quomodo fungos, qui in solo vix detecti sunt, antequam ignis grassari potest, semel in area combusta est.

title: The Western US Is in a Snow Drought. What Comes Next Is Even Scarier
description: Major snowpack deficits could set the stage for widespread water scarcity and heightened wildfire risk across the American West this summer.
content: The mountains of the western United States are looking remarkably brown this winter. The region is facing one of its worst snow droughts in decades, and while the snowsport industry is already feelin… [+3997 chars]
de: Der Westen der USA befindet sich in einer Schneedürre. Was als nächstes kommt, ist noch beängstigender. Große Defizite in der Schneedecke könnten in diesem Sommer die Voraussetzungen für eine weit verbreitete Wasserknappheit und ein erhöhtes Waldbrandrisiko im gesamten amerikanischen Westen schaffen.
en: The Western US Is in a Snow Drought. What Comes Next Is Even Scarier. Major snowpack deficits could set the stage for widespread water scarcity and heightened wildfire risk across the American West this summer.
la: US Occidentis in siccitate nix est. Quid sequitur etiam Scarier. Maior nixpack defectuum scaenam ad magnam inopiam aquarum diffusam constituere potuit et periculum ignem augebat per Americanos Occidentales hac aestate.
